events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund due to customer requesting money back for a wrong item received.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle your case and will assist you shortly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Thank you for responding. The order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product.
We have verified the issue and approved your refund. The amount will be credited back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick resolution! I appreciate the prompt support and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please allow a few days for the transaction to appear on your statement.
We just wanted to follow up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and you have no further questions, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
